title: Synthesis of ethyl furfuryl ether via etherification of furfuryl alcohol with ethanol over montmorillonite K10
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,25221-25226
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03921A, Paper
Open Access

Nobutaka Yamanaka, Koji Nishi, Kenji Yasunaga, Hiroshi Yamada
EFE was easily synthesized from FFalc and ethanol over commercially available, low-cost, and environmentally friendly montmorillonite K10.
